section.p: ‘It’s good to see you remember to turn up at lectures once in a while,’ remarks the senior mage drily as you sidle in at the back of the hall.

p.if:
You must pay in tutorial fees, then .
If you get higher than your current MAGIC score, increase it by 1.
However, if you roll a 2 then you have got things so badly wrong that you lose 1 point of MAGIC.
